snippet.title: Panzer Dragoon Remake - Gameplay Reveal Trailer (E3 Nintendo Direct)
snippet.description:
In a surprise reveal, Panzer Dragoon is being remade for the Nintendo Switch -- and you can see the first-ever footage right here, straight from Nintendo's E3 2019 Direct!

➤ PATREON:  https://www.patreon.com/GameXplain
